name: Tiny Tank (itch)
description:
Made for LD34 game jam using the "growing" theme.

This is a small game about a calming fish tank. You will collect coins that your fish drop while eventually buying fish food and feeding your fish until they grow huge and drop more coins. It's a short and simple game.

Hopefully it's enjoyable even though it's very simple and short :)

Made with LibGDX and Java. Other tools used are listed in the game. Thank you Amber for helping me with the music!
